name: Recipe: Tasses Ragout
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Tasses Ragout.

value.text: Complete Upon a Flowery Field of Grass

customize.name: Tomato
customize.desc: A bright red ingredient that gives a tangy kick. Yes, the "fruit or vegetable" debate is still going...

customize.name: Salt
customize.desc: A savory seasoning. A precise but adequate amount will elevate the quality of the cuisine.

customize.name: Onion
customize.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

customize.name: Tasses Ragout
customize.desc: A vegetable ragout. It is an improvised dish created by Fontainian farmers celebrating vegetable harvests. There are no strict rules for the amount of ingredients or the cooking method. Be it stir-fried or baked, this unpretentious dish never fails to delight with its rustic savor.
